title: Cantina Natural Viva Saude
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Organic, Buffet, Beer/Wine, Bakery, Brazilian, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Healthier cuisine concept restaurant. Offers integral (whole grain) rice and salad grains (soybean, lentils, chickpea). Afternoon tea service Wed-Fri afternoon.
streetAddress: Rua Sebastiao da Silva Leite, 1326, Centro
